00032 #include "egs_particle_track.h"
00033 
00034 void EGS_ParticleTrack::grow() {
00035     // calculate the new size of the vertex array
00036     int new_size = m_size > 0 ? m_size*2 : 16;
00037     // not enough ?? then allocate more
00038     if (m_nVertices > new_size) {
00039         new_size = m_nVertices;
00040     }
00041     Vertex **tmp = new Vertex* [new_size];
00042     if (m_track) {
00043         for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; ++i) {
00044             tmp[i] = m_track[i];
00045         }
00046         delete [] m_track;
00047         m_track = NULL;
00048     }
00049     m_track = tmp;
00050     m_size = new_size;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void EGS_ParticleTrack::clearTrack() {
00054     if (m_pInfo) {
00055         delete m_pInfo;
00056     }
00057     m_pInfo = NULL;
00058     if (m_track)
00059         for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; i++) {
00060             if (m_track[i]) {
00061                 delete m_track[i];
00062             }
00063             m_track[i] = NULL;
00064         }
00065     m_nVertices = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int EGS_ParticleTrack::writeTrack(ofstream *trsp) {
00069     // no need to write the track if it has less than 2 vertices ...
00070     if (m_nVertices < 2) {
00071         return 1;
00072     }
00073     trsp->write((char *)&m_nVertices, sizeof(int));
00074     trsp->write((char *)m_pInfo, sizeof(ParticleInfo));
00075     for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; i++) {
00076         trsp->write((char *)m_track[i],sizeof(Vertex));
00077     }
00078     return 0;
00079 }
00080 
00081 EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *EGS_ParticleTrack::getVertex(int v) {
00082     if ((v < 0) || (v >= m_nVertices)) {
00083         return NULL;
00084     }
00085     return (m_track[v]);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void EGS_ParticleTrack::addVertex(Vertex *x) {
00089     m_track[m_nVertices] = x;
00090     m_nVertices++;
00091     // resize the vertex array if necessary
00092     if (m_nVertices >= m_size) {
00093         grow();
00094     }
00095 }

00098 
00099 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack() {
00100     // buffer full ? flush it
00101     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) {
00102         flushBuffer();
00103     }
00104     m_nTracks++;
00105 
00106     // mark the track as being scored
00107     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack(int stackIndex) {
00111     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) {
00112         flushBuffer();
00113     }
00114     m_nTracks++;
00115 
00116     // map the track on the stack
00117     m_stackMap[stackIndex] = m_nTracks-1;
00118     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00122     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) {
00123         flushBuffer();
00124     }
00125     m_nTracks++;
00126     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00127     m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->setParticleInfo(p);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::flushBuffer() {
00131     int save = 0;
00132     if (m_trspFile) {
00133         for (int i = 0; i < m_nTracks; i++) {
00134             // if the particle is not being scored anymore
00135             if (!m_isScoring[i]) {
00136                 // output it to the file and free memory
00137                 if (!m_buffer[i]->writeTrack(m_trspFile)) {
00138                     m_totalTracks++;
00139                 }
00140                 m_buffer[i]->clearTrack();
00141             }
00142             else {
00143                 // still scoring it -> save the particle
00144                 m_buffer[save] = m_buffer[i];
00145                 m_isScoring[i] = false;
00146                 m_isScoring[save] = true;
00147                 for (int idx = 0; idx < m_bufferSize; idx++) {
00148                     if (m_stackMap[idx] == i) {
00149                         m_stackMap[idx] = save;
00150                         break;
00151                     }
00152                 }
00153                 save++;
00154             }
00155         }
00156         updateHeader();
00157     }
00158     m_nTracks = save;
00159 }
00160 
00161 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::updateHeader() {
00162     if (m_trspFile) {
00163         ostream::off_type pos = m_trspFile->tellp();
00164         m_trspFile->seekp(0,ios::beg);
00165         m_trspFile->write((char *) &m_totalTracks, sizeof(int));
00166         m_trspFile->seekp(pos,ios::beg);
00167     }
00168 }
00169 
00170 EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::getTrackVertex(int tr, int v) {
00171     if ((tr < 0) || (tr >= m_nTracks)) {
00172         return NULL;
00173     }
00174     return (m_buffer[tr]->getVertex(v));
00175 }
00176 
00177 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::addVertex(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x) {
00178     if (!m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1]) {
00179         return;
00180     }
00181     m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->addVertex(x);
00182 }
00183 
00184 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::addVertex(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x) {
00185     if (!m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]]) {
00186         return;
00187     }
00188     m_buffer[m_stackMap[stackIndex]]->addVertex(x);
00189 }
00190 
00191 int EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::readDataFile(const char *filename) {
00192     const char *func_name = "EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::readDataFile()";
00193     ifstream *data = new ifstream(filename, ios::binary);
00194     if (!data || data->fail() || !data->good()) {
00195         egsWarning("%s: Unable to open track space file '%s'! No tracks loaded\n",
00196                    func_name, filename);
00197         return -1;
00198     }
00199     data->read((char *)&m_totalTracks, sizeof(int));
00200     egsInformation("%s: Reading %d tracks from '%s' ...\n", func_name, m_totalTracks, filename);
00201     m_nTracks = 0;
00202     int totalVertices = 0;
00203     m_bufferSize = m_totalTracks;
00204     m_buffer = new EGS_ParticleTrack* [m_totalTracks];
00205     m_stackMap = new int [m_totalTracks];
00206     m_isScoring = new bool [m_totalTracks];
00207     for (int i = 0; i < m_totalTracks; i++) {
00208         int nvertices;
00209         m_buffer[i] = new EGS_ParticleTrack();
00210         m_stackMap[i] = -1;
00211         m_isScoring[i] = false;
00212         EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *pinfo = new EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo(0);
00213         data->read((char *)&nvertices,sizeof(int));
00214         totalVertices += nvertices;
00215         data->read((char *)pinfo,sizeof(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo));
00216         startNewTrack(pinfo);
00217         for (int j = 0; j < nvertices; j++) {
00218             EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *v = new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex();
00219             data->read((char *)v,sizeof(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex));
00220             addVertex(v);
00221         }
00222     }
00223     egsInformation("%s: Tracks in memory: %d\n", func_name, m_nTracks);
00224     egsInformation("%s: Total Vertices  : %d\n", func_name, totalVertices);
00225 
00226     return 0;
00227 }
00228 
00229 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::reportResults(bool with_header) {
00230     flushBuffer();
00231 
00232     // see how many tracks are still being scored
00233     int scoring = -1;
00234     if (m_isScoring) {
00235         scoring = 0;
00236         for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; i++) {
00237             if (m_isScoring[i]) {
00238                 scoring++;
00239             }
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243     if (with_header) {
00244         egsInformation("\nParticle track scoring results:\n");
00245         egsInformation("=================================\n");
00246         egsInformation("   Total events scored:     %d\n", m_nEvents);
00247     }
00248     egsInformation("   Total tracks scored:     %d\n", m_totalTracks);
00249     egsInformation("   Still being scored:      ");
00250     if (scoring == -1) {
00251         egsInformation("Unknown!?\n");
00252     }
00253     else {
00254         egsInformation("%d\n", scoring);
00255         if (scoring > 0) {
00256             egsWarning("   *** There are particles still being tracked. This"
00257                        "   should never happen if this is the end of the simulation!");
00258         }
00259     }
00260     egsInformation("   Output file name:        %s\n\n", m_trspFilename.c_str());
00261 }
